newsitem.title: USA: AEP, PSCo venture hold 92 pct of Yorkshire.
newsitem.headline: AEP, PSCo venture hold 92 pct of Yorkshire.

text.p: American Electric Power Co Inc said Yorkshire Holdings Plc had received 146,861,995 Yorkshire Electricity Group Plc shares as of Tuesday.
The shares represent about 92.3 percent of Yorkshire Electricity's issued shares, which are being sought by Yorkshire Holdings, a joint venture of American Electric and Public Service Co of Colorado.
